title: Massive 2BD/1BTH Top Floor Roslindale + In unit W&D, Parking + Pets OK
posting_body: Contact info:
Beacon Cornerstone Group | Pena Realty Corp | 617-765-1090
Apartment Rental Services in Boston!
REFERENCE #2200
Unfurnished 2 Bedroom Apartments in Roslindale
*AVAILABLE NOW
*Unfurnished
*1 Year Lease
*SMALL PETS OK w. Owner Approval

*Amenities: Great Area just a few blocks from Roslindale Village, Incredibly Spacious 3RD FLOOR 2 Bedroom on Belgrade Ave w. an Office Space, IN UNIT LAUNDRY, Wood Floors, 1 Off Street Parking Space + Plenty of Street Parking, Excellent location in Roslindale ~ conveniently located near transportation, restaurants and much more!!
*Please call today for more information.
Please mention reference #2200 to inquire about the apartments in this ad!
*Move in Costs -1st
Months Rent, Last Months Rent & 1 Month Broker Fee
*AVAILABLE Now or AUGUST 1st
*VIRTUAL TOUR AVAILABLE
** OWNER ASKING STRONG CREDIT & REFERENCES.
Finding an affordable apartment in Boston can be time consuming and quite frustrating.
Responding to ad after ad and dealing with unprofessional people.
I specialize in working with renters because I understand how frustrating the moving process is, especially here in Boston
It is extra gratifying to help a fellow renter have an easy and pleasant experience finding a new home.
I have full access to all listings on the market and I can seriously help you find a great apartment.
Studio/JR. 1 bedrooms - Starting at $1500
1 bedrooms - Starting at $1600+
2 bedrooms - Starting at $1900+
Furnished or Unfurnished
Pets or No Pets ...
I can access it all!
Call or send me an email and let's get to work on finding you the perfect place!
Contact info:
J. Sarae Morales
Beacon Cornerstone Group | Pena Realty Corp.
You can google my name and read the great reviews my clients have written about me.
Here are just a few of the nice things they've had to say about my services:
If you need a realtor that gets things done then Sarae is the one for you.
My experience working with her can be described in three words: transparency, honesty, and fervor.
I found her about three days before I needed to move in.
I gave her some parameters for the type of home I was looking for and within hours she got me a personally curated list of homes.
Each home fit exactly within the parameters and I was beyond ecstatic at the swiftness and responsiveness that she got the list to me.
The next day she had scheduled viewings for some of the houses.
She was quick and if anything was slow in the process it was never her fault.
Let me reiterate - she is beyond fast and responsive.
A couple of viewings later
and I find the house that I absolutely loved and it was all thanks to her proactiveness.
She accomplished all this while being almost 9 months pregnant and ready to pop at any moment.
She is great person and a great realtor and I highly recommend her!**
**Sarae was very helpful and always got back to me quickly.
She's professional and knowledgeable.
When I was changing my mind and changing it back, she never tried to pressure me into a decision.
I'm loving my apartment that she found for me.
